section.title: Displaying thesaurus terms
section.para: Searching by thesaurus terms enables you to surf from subject to subject.

You can explore the subject index from the OPAC home page, if the search by terms feature has been enabled. This search method has much in common with surfing the web with Yahoo. For more details see .
In the subject chosen above no entry is displayed for "Critical analysis - biographies" : the subject is empty and contains no works.

The term Cartoons shows here under the heading Art and Culture > Cartoons and under the heading Youth > Art and culture > Cartoons. A sub-heading of Art and culture > Cartoons, entitled Science fiction contains also one or more works.
To display works falling under a subject, click on the icon
You can also surf among the subjects displayed by clicking on their respective links. Among other things, it enables you to move up one level on the thesaurus tree structure, for example.
